steps.command: wp option update blogname 'AIOHM Demo - AI Assistant That Speaks Your Brand Voice'
wp option update blogdescription 'Experience how AIOHM transforms your WordPress into an intelligent AI hub with demo responses and full UI exploration.'

wp post create --post_type=page --post_status=publish --post_title='AIOHM Demo Experience' --post_content='

wp post create --post_type=post --post_status=publish --post_title='Demo: How AIOHM Protects Your Brand Voice' --post_content='

This demo showcases how AIOHM creates AI responses that sound authentically like your brand, not generic ChatGPT output.

üé≠ What You\'re Seeing

All responses in this demo environment are carefully crafted examples showing:

  • Brand Voice Consistency: How AI maintains your unique tone
  • Context Awareness: Responses grounded in your content
  • Professional Quality: Enterprise-grade AI assistance

üîí Why Demo Responses?

We use simulated responses in this demo to:

  • Protect our intellectual property and algorithms
  • Show you exactly what to expect from each feature
  • Demonstrate the quality without requiring API keys
  • Let you explore the complete interface risk-free

Ready to experience the real thing? Join AIOHM Club for full AI functionality starting at just ‚Ç¨1/month.

'
